original_text: The Lord was pleased to choose you to be his own people. He will show that he is faithful and he will not leave you alone.
korean_text: 여호와께서는 너희를 자기 백성으로 삼으신 것을 기뻐하셨으므로 여호와께서는 그의 크신 이름을 위해서라도 자기 백성을 버리지 아니하실 것이요

sentences.original_text: The Lord was pleased to choose you
He will show that he is faithful
and he will not leave you alone
